Hero.competence: with experience in creating efficient and high-quality web solutions.

About.title: About me
About.text_1: Hello, my name is Felipe and I've been a developer for three years. My journey in web development began in 2020 when I had my first professional opportunity in the field as a front-end developer, where I fell in love with the world of code.
About.text_2: Currently, I am a full-stack developer at Pandorga Tech in Porto Alegre, where I had the opportunity to develop a platform tailored for politicians from scratch using React, and also had my first experience working with Node.
About.text_3: These are some of the technologies I have already used:

Contact.title: Get in touch
Contact.text: Feel free to send me a message, my inbox is always open. I will do my best to respond as soon as possible.
